ResearchProjectDef.label: slingshot
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft a simple device used to pelt enemies with stones - tends to be far less lethal than bow and arrow.

ResearchProjectDef.label: stun stick
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft an industrial era melee weapon which delivers an incredibly painful jolt.

ResearchProjectDef.label: beanbag gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft an industrial era ranged weapon which fires incapacitatingly painful less-lethal beanbags at enemies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: riot rifle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft a modern era assault rifle which fires painful rubber bullets to subdue targets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: net launcher
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to manufacture a a rocket launcher which fires a light net at an enemy and stops their movement while trying to escape from the net.

ResearchProjectDef.label: zap rifle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to manufacture a modified charge rifle which fires an incredibly painful jolt to subdue enemies.
